Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence

Interface NodeSettingsPersistor<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of object loaded by the persistor
All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldNodeSettingsPersistor<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Credentials.CredentialsPersistor, EnumFieldPersistor, FieldBasedNodeSettingsPersistor, FSLocationPersistor, LegacyColumnFilterPersistor, NodeSettingsPersistorWithConfigKey, SelectionCheckboxesToSelectionModePersistor, StringArrayToColumnFilterPersistor, StringToColumnSelectionPersistor
public interface NodeSettingsPersistor<T>
Implementing classes save objects to and load objects from NodeSettings.
Custom implementations must be immutable and provide either an empty or a constructor that accepts the Class of the persisted object as input.
Author:
Adrian Nembach, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

    • createInstance

      static <S, P extends NodeSettingsPersistor<S>> P createInstance(Class<P> persistorClass, Class<S> persistedObjectClass)
      Creates a new instance from the provided NodeSettingsPersistor class by calling its empty constructor.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of object to persist
      P - the type of persistor to instantiate
      Parameters:
      persistorClass - the class of NodeSettingsPersistor
      persistedObjectClass -
      Returns:
      a new instance of the provided class
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the class does not have an empty constructor, is abstract, or the constructor raises an exception
